ValidationRule.description: If phone begins with +44, it cannot begin with +447 because that is a mobile number.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT($Permission.IntegrationUser) && ISBLANK(MobilePhone) && BEGINS( Phone , "+44") && BEGINS( Phone , "+447") && NOT(ISCHANGED(OwnerId))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Mobile numbers can't be stored in the phone field
